SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller

Interface ControllerInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientControllerInterface, ServerControllerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController, ConnectionController, GameController, LobbyController, ServerController
public interface ControllerInterface
The ControllerInterface serves as a common interface for the controllers present in the application, providing a unified type for managing different aspects of the application.

Implementations of this interface are responsible for handling the logic required in their context. The known implementing classes and interfaces include:

  • ClientController
  • ClientControllerInterface
  • ConnectionController
  • GameController
  • LobbyController
  • ServerController
  • ServerControllerInterface
